## Eine Karte von einem interessanten Ort

```{r,message=F,warning=F}
library(ggmap)
qmap('Amsterdam', zoom = 14, maptype="satellite")
```

## Anreiseweg in einer Karte darstellen

```{r,message=F,warning=F}
from <- "Mannheim Heumarkt 2"
to <- "Mannheim B2 , 1"
route_df <- route(from, to, structure = "route")
```

## Eine Karte erzeugen

```{r,message=F,warning=F}
qmap("Mannheim Hbf", zoom = 12) +
  geom_path(
    aes(x = lon, y = lat),  colour = "red", size = 1.5,
    data = route_df, lineend = "round"
  )
```

## Die Route mit dem Fahhrad

```{r,message=F,warning=F}
route_df2 <- route(from, to, structure = "route",
                   mode="bicycling")
qmap("Mannheim Wassertrum", zoom = 12) +
  geom_path(
    aes(x = lon, y = lat),  colour = "red", size = 1.5,
    data = route_df2, lineend = "round"
  )
```
